requirements.description: Developer represents and warrants that it shall conspicuously post, maintain, and abide by a publically accessible privacy notice within the Developer App
The privacy notice must satisfy the transparency and information requirements of the Privacy Requirements and the Agreement
If notice cannot be provided in or around Vungle Ads, Developer should make arrangements to provide notice within the Developer App or on the landing page of the Vungle Ad
The notice shall include information about Vungle and its Demand Partner's use of Tracking Technology to collect, use, and share Ad Data
The notice shall state that third parties may collect or receive Personal Data and use it to provide measurement services and targeted ads

type.summary: Disclosure of Third Party Data Use

requirements.description: The notice shall include a conspicuous link to or description of how and where users can opt-out of collection and use of information for ad targeting
The notice shall describe the types of Ad Data collected, including Personal Data, and how and for what purposes the Ad Data will be used or transferred to third parties

For Ad Data protected by EU Data Protection Law, the privacy notice shall include the type of Personal Data collected, the purposes of processing, categories of individuals with access, legitimate interests pursued, the identity of the Controller(s), and any other information required by the EU Data Protection Law
